title: Demon Apocalypse
description: When Remy and her team stormed Lilith’s compound, she revealed herself as The Chosen One. Now, Lilith has pooled every available resource to find her and will not stop until Remy, and all who follow her, meet a gruesome death.In a race against time, the siblings must escape L.A. and Lilith’s wrath. Remy knows death knocks at her door and is ready to answer, but what price will she pay for accepting her destiny?
author: Willow Cross
